name: Chalet Modern Life
description:
Welcome in Chalet Modern Life!
As of summer 2016, our newly built Chalet Modern Life will be available for your well-deserved vacation. The house is located on a small hill, offering a fantastic view of the Zillertal mountains. The whole house is decorated in a rustic style combined with many modern and high-quality elements.
So that not only your holiday but also your arrival will be as comfortable and easy as possible, we offer our own parking in front of the house. You won’t have to miss out on any luxury. The chalet is family-friendly, offers free Wi-Fi, and is a non-smoking house. The integrated underfloor heating in the cold months provides pleasant, cozy warmth.
In the winter, you can conveniently store your skis and ski boots in our ski storage area in a lockable ski locker after an exhausting day of skiing. The ski bus stop is only about 50m away from the house. From here, you can enjoy a comfortable ride to the Mayrhofen lifts.
In the summer you can enjoy the evening relaxing in our furnished garden. Sports activities are also an option, since the house is located right on the hiking trail.
We will be happy to inform you about additional activities and sightseeing opportunities for you and your whole family.
We look forward to seeing you! The Aschenwald family

Check in: 4:00 PM
Check out: 10:00 AM

Bail: 
Apart 2-4 people € 200,-
Apart 4-10 people € 400,-
Apart 7-11 people € 400,-
Apart 10-15 people € 500,-
Your apartment will be available on the day of arrival from 4:00 pm. If you already arrive earlier, you are welcome to leave your luggage in the storage room in the meantime.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The apartment for 4-10 people with about 110m² is furnished in a cozy style and has 3 bedrooms, all of which have a flat-screen TV. Also located in this apartment a large kitchen (fridge-freezer, oven, dishwasher, ceramic cooktop with extractor hood, coffee maker & water electric kettle) with dining area, flat screen TV, radio, safe, extra toilet & terrace. 2 small bathrooms with shower & washbasin. 1 large bathroom with shower, bathtub, toilet, double sink, hairdryer, cosmetic mirror.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, noise-proof
makesOffer.description: The small apartment for 2-4 persons with 40m² is furnished in a cozy style. It consists of a bedroom with double bed & single bed & flat screen TV, a living room with a sleeper sofa for 1 person, a kitchenette (fridge-freezer, oven, dishwasher, ceramic cooktop with extractor hood, coffee maker & electric kettle) with dining area, flat screen TV, radio, safe & terrace. Bathroom: shower, sink, toilet, hairdryer, cosmetic mirror, cosmetic wipes & toiletries (including towels and bed linens.).

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 4 or more bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The spacious apartment with about 135m² for 10-15 people is a combination of the apartment for 2-4 people & the apartment for 7-11 people. The entire top floor is thus available to families or groups for a relaxing vacation. It is furnished in a comfortable style and has 4 bedrooms, all of which have a flat-screen TV. A kitchen & kitchenette (fridge-freezer, oven, dishwasher, ceramic cooktop with extractor hood, coffee maker & electric kettle), 4 bathrooms, balcony, terrace
